name: Slimy Gravity
description:
A game made with TIC-80 where you must rotate gravity. There are 10 levels, 1 boss level and 1 short film. The puzzles are quite challenging so be warned. I will add more levels and I want to hear opinions too.

Use the arrows to move and jump, use Z and X to rotate gravity left and right, you can't rotate gravity twice while in mid-air. Use S for a menu to restart the level or go back to the main menu.
